Senior Risk Management Analyst Job at First HoldCo




        
    

        
        First HoldCo is a financial holding company and one of the largest financial services organisations in Africa. It is a diversified and leading financial services Group offering a broad range of products and services through its subsidiaries, across commercial banking, merchant banking, capital markets, trusteeship and insurance brokerage to millions of customers.

FirstHoldCo has oversight over its subsidiaries and drives group coordination, collaboration and synergies among other principal activities towards innovative financial solutions and enhanced shareholder value.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Risk Management Analyst

Job Location: Lagos

	Postgraduate degree will be an added advantage

	Minimum of 7 years of banking or financial service industry experience with at least 4 years in Risk Management related function.

Job Position: Front Desk / Customer Representative

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Having successfully transformed to a retail and commercial banking-led group, FCMB expects to continue to distinguish itself by delivering exceptional services, while enhancing the growth and achievement of the personal and business aspirations of our customers.

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo

Role Description

	This is a full-time, on-site role based in Ibadan for a Chief Financial Officer (CFO).

	Key responsibilities include financial planning, preparing and analyzing financial statements, regulatory reporting, developing budgets, identifying cost-saving opportunities, and leading the finance team to achieve operational excellence.


Qualifications


	Strong expertise in Financial Planning and Finance management
	Proven capabilities in preparing and analyzing Financial Statements and Financial Reporting
	Exceptional Analytical Skills to identify trends, risks, and opportunities
	Leadership, team management skills, and the ability to work collaboratively across departments
	Proficiency in financial software and tools
